entries.name: DCA Strategy Assistant
entries.description: Dollar-cost averaging strategy - analyzes portfolios and recommends DCA plans based on risk tolerance and market conditions.
entries.author: finclaw-commons

entries.name: Tax Reporting Assistant
entries.description: Tax reporting assistant - generates tax summaries from transaction history including capital gains, income categorization, and jurisdiction-specific rules.
entries.author: finclaw-commons

entries.name: Risk Manager
entries.description: Risk management suite - position sizing, Value-at-Risk, stress testing, correlation analysis, and risk-adjusted performance metrics for institutional-grade portfolio risk control.
entries.author: finclaw-commons

entries.name: News Intelligence
entries.description: Financial news intelligence - multi-source sentiment scoring, event impact analysis, historical analogies, and personalized portfolio-aware digests.
entries.author: finclaw-commons

entries.name: Strategy Backtester
entries.description: Strategy backtesting engine - test trading strategies against historical data, compute performance metrics, optimize parameters, and run Monte Carlo simulations.
entries.author: finclaw-commons

entries.name: On-Chain Analytics
entries.description: On-chain analytics - blockchain valuation metrics, DeFi protocol analysis, whale tracking, yield comparison, and token unlock impact assessment.
entries.author: finclaw-commons

entries.name: Macro Calendar & Regime Analyst
entries.description: Macroeconomic calendar and regime analysis - economic event tracking, earnings dates, macro regime classification, cross-market impact cascades, and portfolio event exposure.
entries.author: finclaw-commons

entries.name: FinClaw Starter Workspace
entries.description: Starter workspace template with finance-focused defaults, recommended skills, and example configuration.
entries.author: finclaw-commons
